Azerite Items

The following charts show the value of specific Azerite items in single target and AoE situations. Use this as a general guide for the top few highest-simming pieces, but don’t treat it as gospel. Note that at this time, any trait synergies between item slots are not visible in these charts. Data was generated by bloodmallet.com.
